feature.label: Azzyzt JEE modeling with entities, magwien version
feature.description: Azzyzt JEE Tools (magwien) is a collection of software tools designed to assist software developers creating software using Java Enterprise Edition 6. It is designed to be integrated into popular Java IDEs.
